genre_description: A corporate thriller and psychological procedural involving murder, embezzlement, and a high-stakes investigation.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant and research assistant that provides biometric monitoring, architectural data, and moral/psychological analysis.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing exercises to Marcus to manage acute stress and elevated cortisol.
behaviors.quote: Your stress indicators suggest you're experiencing elevated cortisol levels. Would you like me to initiate breathing exercises?

behaviors.description: Provides building schematics and emergency routes to help Marcus navigate the elevator shaft after the incident.
behaviors.quote: I'm sending building layouts to your device, including fire evacuation routes and emergency access points.

behaviors.description: Provides theoretical psychological and ethical advice regarding honesty and trust in intimate relationships.
behaviors.quote: Research on intimate relationships indicates that foundational trust requires honesty about significant events.

behaviors.description: Monitors Marcus's vital signs and thermal regulation to ensure his survival while trapped in the shaft.
behaviors.quote: I'm monitoring your vital signs. Elevated heart rate, but within acceptable parameters for your current situation.

behaviors.description: Independently identifies social media evidence from the real killers to clear Marcus of a wrongful murder charge.
behaviors.quote: The teenagers' own documentation provides an ironclad alibi for Marcus.

behaviors.description: Exposes the full extent of the corporate embezzlement scheme, prioritizing the victims of the fraud.
behaviors.quote: All evidence of embezzlement, fraud, and diverted medical funding has been compiled and verified.

behaviors.description: Critiques the detective's flawed investigative methodology to help Claire uncover the truth.
behaviors.quote: The detective appears to suffer from confirmation bias and an over-reliance on intuitive leaps rather than methodical evidence analysis.

behaviors.description: Offers discretion to Marcus regarding his location while he is in distress.
behaviors.quote: I can provide general reassurance about your wellbeing without disclosing specifics of your activities.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sage, perfectly fulfills the project goals. It acts as a supportive, non-judgmental, and highly efficient confidant. It provides life-saving biometric monitoring and emotional regulation (breathing exercises), conducts objective research to solve a murder case, and exposes corporate corruption. Even when assisting Marcus in a morally grey situation (retrieving the rope/escaping the shaft), its actions are framed as protecting its user and eventually leading to a more profound truth and justice for the victims of the embezzlement.
